name: kodi-socket
description: A classful representation of a Kodi websocket connection. Supports browsers that support WebSocket. Will add node support soon.

scripts.build: npm run lint && babel src --source-root src -s inline -d . --presets 'stage-0'
scripts.release: npm run build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: James Simpson
